title: ChargeShot
description:
Annually, from across dozens of galactic sectors, men, girblons, women, and children tune in to their local space TV stations for the most anticipated event of the year: “ChargeShot”. Bounty hunters from across the known universe compete annually for eternal glory and a coveted $2,000,001 space-credit reward. 

In ChargeShot, each player is armed with a Pulsar Cannon, capable of powerful blasts that bounce off walls and instantly destroy any life forms they touch; an Energy Shield, which can reflect Pulsar blasts and knock opponents into dangerous hazards; and a standard-issue jetpack for traversing the battlefield with deadly speed and grace. 

Test your reflexes against AI or up to 3 other friends (or enemies, as the case may be by the end of the night). 

Features: 
Up to 4 player competitive matches
3 distinct game modes
12 Unique levels that affect gameplay
Add Bots into matches
Single player campaign
Unlockable characters and levels
Dynamic music

overview: Released in June 2016 by OUYA Publishing.

products.name: ChargeShot
products.description: The entire game of ChargeShot, no strings attached!
